name: Standard AI
headline: AI-powered checkout for retail.
description: Standard Cognition is an artificial intelligence platform that allows buyers to grab what they want without having to go to a cashier.

founders.name: John Novak
founders.description:
Co-founder of Standard Cognition.
PhD - Nuclear Physics - Michigan State 2013

# Unlock the Power of AI in Retail
[Let's Talk](https://standard.ai/</contact-us>)
Reinforced with Key Partnerships
[ ![Logo 1](https://standard.ai/wp-content/uploads/2024/03/googlecloud.png) ](https://standard.ai/<https:/google.com>)
![Logo 2](https://standard.ai/wp-content/uploads/2024/03/axis.png)
[ ![Logo 3](https://standard.ai/wp-content/uploads/2024/03/nvidia.png) ](https://standard.ai/<https:/nvidia.com>)
## Take a peek into the power of
![Title Image](https://standard.ai/wp-content/uploads/2024/03/vision-logo.png)
### by Standard AI
![Alternating Image 1](https://standard.ai/wp-content/uploads/2024/03/SAI_01_Predictive.gif)
### Predictive insights
Imagine seeing the impact of merchandising changes before you move a single item. Take the blinders off and see with full VISION.
#### What could that do for your bottom line?
![Alternating Image 2](https://standard.ai/wp-content/uploads/2024/03/SAI_02_ShelfAvailability.gif)
### Increase shelf availability
Imagine never having low inventory affect your potential sales now that predictive AI increases shelf availability. Keep more products on the shelf so you can see them fly off it.
#### What could that do to maximize your sales?
![Alternating Image 3](https://standard.ai/wp-content/uploads/2024/05/SAI_03_Real-Time.gif)
### Real-time offers
Imagine triggering real-time and relevant offers based on a customer’s predicted path. With more certainty comes more possibilities.
#### What could that do for your average basket size?
![Alternating Image 4](https://standard.ai/wp-content/uploads/2024/05/SAI_04_LossPrevention.gif)
### Loss prevention
Imagine receiving curated videos of every potential theft from VISION’s unmatched AI theft detection. You’ll only review events likely to be theft.
#### What could that do for your loss prevention?
![Slider Title](https://standard.ai/wp-content/uploads/2024/03/vision-logo.png)
#### See the data that matters most from Vision's AI enabled cameras in your own dashboard.
![Prev Arrow](https://standard.ai/assets/images/prev-arrow.svg)
![Slide Image 3](https://standard.ai/wp-content/uploads/2024/05/Product-Screen-Slider_Block-03-1.webp)
## Conversion % and Sales
Conversion % and Sales: Effectively track conversion rates, sales performance, and where shopper interactions occur within your store, including displays vs home locations.
![Slide Image 1](https://standard.ai/wp-content/uploads/2024/05/Product-Screen-Slider_Block-01-1.webp)
## Traffic & Impressions
Traffic & Impressions: Gain insights into foot traffic patterns and shopper interactions, allowing for optimized store layouts and promotional strategies.
![Slide Image 2](https://standard.ai/wp-content/uploads/2024/05/Product-Screen-Slider_Block-02.webp)
## Unprecedented Insights
Our AI enables deep understanding of shoppers, product interactions, and store dynamics, providing previously unattainable insights.
![Slide Image 3](https://standard.ai/wp-content/uploads/2024/05/Product-Screen-Slider_Block-03-1.webp)
## Conversion % and Sales
Conversion % and Sales: Effectively track conversion rates, sales performance, and where shopper interactions occur within your store, including displays vs home locations.
![Slide Image 1](https://standard.ai/wp-content/uploads/2024/05/Product-Screen-Slider_Block-01-1.webp)
## Traffic & Impressions
Traffic & Impressions: Gain insights into foot traffic patterns and shopper interactions, allowing for optimized store layouts and promotional strategies.
![Next Arrow](https://standard.ai/assets/images/next-arrow.svg)
  * 1
  * 2
  * 3


## One Trusted Tech Partner with Standard AI
01
### Privacy First and Always
AI technology that never uses facial recognition to safeguard your customer’s privacy.
02
### Simplicity over Complexity
Straightforward AI solutions, thoughtfully designed to solve real world problems.
03
### One Platform, Multiple Solutions
Portfolio of products to customize your tech strategy.
04
### Proven Technology
Mature tech stack with demonstrated accuracy and unparalleled fidelity.

generated_description:
**Company Overview: Standard AI**

**Mission:** Revolutionizing retail checkout with AI-powered technology.

Founded in 2017 originally as Standard Cognition, Standard AI is headquartered in San Francisco. This innovative company has rapidly earned its stripes as a key player in retail tech, particularly known for creating a seamless shopping experience that eliminates the need for cashiers. The premise? Customers can pick up what they want and simply walk out.

**Background:** 
Standard AI was part of the Y Combinator Batch S17, which is a notable accelerator for startups, giving it an early boost in technology and network. With a robust team of around 150 employees, they are well-positioned to deliver cutting-edge solutions tailored for the retail sector.

**Innovation and Tech:**
The platform is powered by advanced AI that aids retailers in various areas, including:

1. **Predictive Insights:** Retailers can visualize the impact of merchandising changes before executing them.
2. **Shelf Availability Management:** AI helps maintain inventory levels, maximizing sales potential by ensuring products are always available.
3. **Real-Time Offers:** The system can trigger personalized offers for customers based on their shopping behavior in real-time.
4. **Loss Prevention:** Utilizing advanced theft detection AI, retailers can receive curated alerts on suspicious activity.

Their suite of products is designed with privacy in mind, notably avoiding facial recognition to protect customer identity. They focus on creating straightforward solutions that tackle real-world issues efficiently.

**Key Partnerships:**
Standard AI collaborates with industry leaders like Google Cloud and NVIDIA, reinforcing its technological edge and credibility within the retail tech landscape.

**Company Values:**
The guiding principles of Standard AI are centered on privacy, simplicity, proven technology, and offering diverse solutions in one platform. They aim to provide retailers with unprecedented insights into shopper dynamics and store operations.

**Looking Ahead:**
Standard AI's commitment to innovation positions it as a trusted partner in the evolving retail landscape. If you’re interested in transforming your checkout experience or optimizing retail strategies through AI, they’re open for business.

**Website:** To learn more about their offerings, visit [Standard AI](https://standard.ai).
